timeline.message:
Revert "Implement IShapedRecipe and add new module patchwork-recipes"

This reverts commit b020b67e7391164a458976ae0ea00ff44b8c9f14.

Revert "Implement IShapedRecipe and add new module patchwork-recipes"

This reverts commit c59ede6a0a743c8934341a28e35272fb14b37640.
change the way of getting parent mod container
make sub mods share the same ModFileInfo

Revert "Revert "Annotation Scanning""

This reverts commit b36fc8bac5a127c8b67c44f5b343441556a67391.

Merge branch 'annotation' of https://github.com/qouteall/patchwork-api

 Conflicts:
	patchwork-recipes/src/main/java/net/patchworkmc/mixin/recipes/MixinRecipeGridAligner.java
	settings.gradle

timeline.body:
Should be private unless it's accessed elsewhere
```suggestion
	private ModContainer modContainer;
```
timeline.bodyHTML:
Should be private unless it's accessed elsewhere

Suggested change
ModContainer modContainer;
private ModContainer modContainer;
timeline.author: coderbot16

timeline.body:
This makes it more explicit whether it is the annotation data or the mod itself that is missing
```suggestion
			LOGGER.error("ModFileScanData: Tried to access the scanned annotation data for " + getModid() + ", but the data is missing");
```
timeline.bodyHTML:
This makes it more explicit whether it is the annotation data or the mod itself that is missing

Suggested change
LOGGER.error("ModFileScanData: Tried to access the scanned annotation data for " + getModid() + ", but it is missing");
LOGGER.error("ModFileScanData: Tried to access the scanned annotation data for " + getModid() + ", but the data is missing");
timeline.author: coderbot16

timeline.body: This should probably be a `ModContainer` argument as well to mirror `ModFile`.
timeline.bodyText: This should probably be a ModContainer argument as well to mirror ModFile.
timeline.bodyHTML: This should probably be a ModContainer argument as well to mirror ModFile.
timeline.author: coderbot16
